oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.v2.ui.components
Interface AttachmentCustomComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttachmentViewCustomComp
public interface AttachmentCustomComponent

Interface to be implemented by all Attachment V2 Components. This interface will signify that the attachment component can be used with the AttachmentPublicUtils API's.

Since:
11.1.1.7.4
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/UIComponents/ViewController/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/attachments/v2/ui/components/AttachmentCustomComponent.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.4/2 2014/11/10 14:03:00 nlo Exp $

Method Summary
 long getAttachmentCount()
          Provide the total number of attachments that the component has.
 AttachmentsReadOnlyRow getAttachmentForIndex(java.lang.Object attachmentIndex)
          Retrieve the attrachment row that exists at the index provided.
 AttachmentsReadOnlyRow[] getAttachments()
          Provide a handle to all rows that the component has.
 long getSelectedAttachmentCount()
          Provide the total number of selected attachments that the component has.
 AttachmentsReadOnlyRow[] getSelectedAttachments()

          Determine if there is an attrachment row that exists for the index provided.
 

Method Detail

getAttachmentCount

long getAttachmentCount()
Provide the total number of attachments that the component has.

Returns:
the row count.

getAttachments

AttachmentsReadOnlyRow[] getAttachments()
Provide a handle to all rows that the component has. These rows will be read-only.

Returns:
the array of attachment rows. This will never return null.

getSelectedAttachmentCount

long getSelectedAttachmentCount()
Provide the total number of selected attachments that the component has.

Returns:
the selected row count.

getSelectedAttachments

AttachmentsReadOnlyRow[] getSelectedAttachments()
Provide a handle to the rows that are selected in the component. These rows will be read-only.

Returns:
the array of selected attachment rows. This will never return null.

isAttachmentForIndex

boolean isAttachmentForIndex(java.lang.Object attachmentIndex)
Determine if there is an attrachment row that exists for the index provided.

Parameters:
attachmentIndex - the index of the attachment.
Returns:
true if there is an attachment at index attachmentIndex.

getAttachmentForIndex

AttachmentsReadOnlyRow getAttachmentForIndex(java.lang.Object attachmentIndex)
Retrieve the attrachment row that exists at the index provided.

Parameters:
attachmentIndex - the index of the attachment.
Returns:
the attachment at index attachmentIndex, otherwise null.
